To enter the raffle for a guaranteed @Achoo_NFT super spreader spot, beside names like - Pranksy, Matt Medved, Richerd, and more, all you have to do is -

üöÄ Like & RT this thread (tweet no. 1)
üöÄ Follow @Achoo_NFT 
üöÄ Tag 2 friends to spread the Achoo pandemic.

Good Luck! https://t.co/4KnPdKt6bn

5/6
The 25 left are going to be selected from the @Achoo_NFT discord, and 1 of them is going to be randomly selected in the following giveaway.

4/6
From the 100 super spreader spots, 25 have already been given.

The 50 people who get an inconclusive result on their Achoo Virus Test Kit, that goes on public minting tomorrow, will be eligible too (https://t.co/tMXuD8PvnL).

3/6
The cool thing is that the 100 super spreaders are the people who control the virality - they can use the Sneezes to mint more Achoos, give them to friends, sell them, or whatever.

Then, the team can analyze how the @Achoo_NFT pandemic spreads.

2/6
Viral minting is a social experiment where 100 super-spreaders are allowed to mint an @Achoo_NFT, and they also get 10 Sneezes each.

If you have a Sneeze, you can mint another Achoo, but the second batch gets only 5 Sneezes.

1/6
The most exciting social minting experiment in NFTs is coming on March 10th!

It is called viral minting, and it will be tested on @Achoo_NFT project.

So what's viral minting?
